41.ara-name: كتاب العلم عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Hurairah:that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "Leave me with what I left you. When I narrated a Hadith to you, then take it from me. The people before you were only destroyed by their excessive questioning and disagreeing with their Prophets

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الاِنْتِهَاءِ عَمَّا نَهَى عَنْهُ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ صلى الله عليه وسلم
chapter.eng-name: Regarding Refraining From What Was Prohibited By The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ)
